publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-4012.6.2 Mr John McAllion: The Current International Situationâ€”As an amendment to amendment (S1M-4012.6) in the name of Patricia Ferguson, leave out from "the authority" to end and insert "no case for military action against Iraq has been proven."
